## SavedObjectTypeRegistry.getAllTypes() method

Return all [types](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.savedobjectstype.md) currently registered, including the hidden ones.

To only get the visible types (which is the most common use case), use `getVisibleTypes` instead.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAllTypes(): SavedObjectsType[];
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`SavedObjectsType[]`
